name: AppXchange Source
description: AppXchange is a service created to easily share and download files. The images are for a beta version of the app. The app is still in development and may have bugs. If you find any bugs, please report them

name: Atomica
description:
Introducing Atomica. Atomica is a small indie game about merging elements into heavier elements. Atoms with a simmilar CPK colors merge together. Hold the mouse button to control the atom, and let go to release. 

 This is an alpha version of the game, and there is a more recent version. This game will be updated soon.

name: AppXchange MacOS
description: This is a macOS app for AppXchange. It is a compiled version of 'AppXchange Source'
